languages.text: "Во время вашего отсутствия, Лорд-капитан, мы прикладывали все усилия, чтобы найти вас. В связи с этим корабль претерпел изменения и был значительно улучшен. Многоуважаемый Высокий фактотум смог заключить выгодную сделку — теперь на корабле установлены новейшие авгурные системы и пеленгаторы с Кьявы-Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "Во время вашего отсутствия, Лорд-капитан, мы прикладывали все усилия, чтобы найти вас. В связи с этим корабль претерпел изменения и был значительно улучшен. Многоуважаемый Высокий Фактотум смог заключить выгодную сделку — теперь на корабле установлены новейшие авгурные системы и пеленгаторы с Кьявы-Гамма".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "While you were absent, Lord Captain, we made every effort to find you. That resulted in a number of modifications to the ship that have significantly upgraded it. Thanks to a favourable deal secured by the esteemed High Factotum, the ship is now equipped with state-of-the-art augur systems and direction finders from Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "Во время вашего отсутствия, Лорд-капитан, мы прикладывали все усилия, чтобы найти вас. В связи с этим корабль претерпел изменения и был значительно улучшен. Thanks to a favourable deal secured by the esteemed High Factotum, the ship is now equipped with state-of-the-art augur systems and direction finders from Kiava Gamma."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “舰长大人，您不在的这段期间，我们竭尽全力寻找您。因此，我们对这艘船的部分系统也进行了升级，舰船的性能变得更加出色。多亏了尊敬的高阶顾问，我们通过极其优惠的价格对舰船进行了升级。目前，您的舰船配备了最先进的俄歇矩阵，以及来自基亚瓦伽马星的定向装置。”
languages.original_text: "While you were absent, Lord Captain, we made every effort to find you. That resulted in a number of modifications to the ship that have significantly upgraded it. Thanks to a favourable deal secured by the esteemed High Factotum, the ship is now equipped with state-of-the-art augur systems and direction finders from Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您不在的这段期间，我们竭尽全力寻找您。因此，我们对这艘船的部分系统也进行了升级，舰船的性能变得更加出色。多亏了尊敬的高阶顾问，我们通过极其优惠的价格对舰船进行了升级。目前，您的舰船配备了最先进的俄歇矩阵，以及来自基亚瓦伽马星的定向装置。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Während Ihr fort wart, Lord Captain, haben wir alle Anstrengungen unternommen, Euch zu finden. Das hat zu einer Reihe von Modifikationen am Schiff geführt, durch die es deutlich verbessert wurde. Das verehrte Hoch-Faktotum hat sehr gute Verträge ausgehandelt, weshalb das Schiff nun mit hochmodernen Augurensystemen und Richtungsfindern von Kiava Gamma ausgestattet ist."
languages.original_text: "While you were absent, Lord Captain, we made every effort to find you. That resulted in a number of modifications to the ship that have significantly upgraded it. Thanks to a favourable deal secured by the esteemed High Factotum, the ship is now equipped with state-of-the-art augur systems and direction finders from Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Während Ihr fort wart, Lord Captain, haben wir alle Anstrengungen unternommen, Euch zu finden. Das hat zu einer Reihe von Modifikationen am Schiff geführt, durch die es deutlich verbessert wurde. Das verehrte Hoch-Faktotum hat sehr gute Verträge ausgehandelt, weshalb das Schiff nun mit hochmodernen Augurensystemen und Richtungsfindern von Kiava Gamma ausgestattet ist."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, durante su ausencia hicimos todo lo posible por encontrarle. A tal fin, instalamos diversas modificaciones en la nave que han mejorado sus prestaciones de manera considerable. Gracias a un acuerdo muy favorable firmado por el estimado Sumo Factótum, ahora la nave está equipada con sistemas augures de vanguardia y calculadores de derrota de Kiava Gamma».
languages.original_text: "While you were absent, Lord Captain, we made every effort to find you. That resulted in a number of modifications to the ship that have significantly upgraded it. Thanks to a favourable deal secured by the esteemed High Factotum, the ship is now equipped with state-of-the-art augur systems and direction finders from Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, durante su ausencia hicimos todo lo posible por encontrarle. A tal fin, instalamos diversas modificaciones en la nave que han mejorado sus prestaciones de manera considerable. Gracias a un acuerdo muy favorable firmado por el estimado sumo factótum, ahora la nave está equipada con sistemas augures de vanguardia y calculadores de derrota de Kiava Gamma».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « En votre absence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons tout fait pour vous retrouver. Nos efforts nous ont notamment amenés à apporter plusieurs améliorations importantes à votre vaisseau. Grâce à un accord avantageux conclu par l'estimé haut factotum, il est désormais équipé d'augures et de systèmes directionnels de pointe provenant de Kiava Gamma. »
languages.original_text: "While you were absent, Lord Captain, we made every effort to find you. That resulted in a number of modifications to the ship that have significantly upgraded it. Thanks to a favourable deal secured by the esteemed High Factotum, the ship is now equipped with state-of-the-art augur systems and direction finders from Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: « En votre absence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons tout fait pour vous retrouver. Nos efforts nous ont notamment amenés à apporter plusieurs améliorations importantes à votre vaisseau. Grâce à un accord avantageux conclu par l'estimé haut factotum, il est désormais équipé d'augures et de systèmes directionnels de pointe provenant de Kiava Gamma. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン。あなたが留守の間、我々はあなたを見つけるためにあらゆる努力をしました。その結果、船に多くの改良を加えることとなり、それにより船は大幅にアップグレードされました。高名なハイ・ファクトタムによる好意的な取引のおかげで、この船は現在、キアヴァ・ガンマの最新鋭のスキャナーシステムと方向探知機を装備しています」
languages.original_text: "While you were absent, Lord Captain, we made every effort to find you. That resulted in a number of modifications to the ship that have significantly upgraded it. Thanks to a favourable deal secured by the esteemed High Factotum, the ship is now equipped with state-of-the-art augur systems and direction finders from Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン。あなたが留守の間、我々はあなたを見つけるためにあらゆる努力をしました。その結果、船に多くの改良を加えることとなり、それにより船は大幅にアップグレードされました。高名なハイ・ファクトタムによる好意的な取引のおかげで、この船は現在、キアヴァ・ガンマの最新鋭のスキャナーシステムと方向探知機を装備しています」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, siz yokken size dair bir iz yakalamak için her şeyi yaptık. Bu sırada gemide bir dizi değişikliğe gittik ve bu durum, geminin önemli derecede gelişmesine yol açtı. Saygıdeğer Arşıkâhya'nın yaptığı faydalı anlaşma sayesinde gemi artık son teknoloji alamet sistemleriyle ve Kiava Gama'dan gelme yön bulucularla donatıldı."
languages.original_text: "While you were absent, Lord Captain, we made every effort to find you. That resulted in a number of modifications to the ship that have significantly upgraded it. Thanks to a favourable deal secured by the esteemed High Factotum, the ship is now equipped with state-of-the-art augur systems and direction finders from Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, siz yokken size dair bir iz yakalamak için her şeyi yaptık. Bu sırada gemide bir dizi değişiklik yaptık ve bu durum, geminin önemli derecede gelişmesine yol açtı. Saygıdeğer Arşıkâhya'nın yaptığı faydalı anlaşma sayesinde gemi artık son teknoloji alamet sistemleriyle ve Kiava Gama'dan yön bulucularla donatıldı."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
